# SWAttributionView.HorizontalAlignment.default

**Case**

Allows the system to choose the horizontal alignment.

## Declaration

```swift
case `default`
```

## Horizontal alignments

- **SWAttributionView.HorizontalAlignment.leading**: Aligns horizontally with the leading edge of the view.
- **SWAttributionView.HorizontalAlignment.center**: Aligns horizontally with the center of the view.
- **SWAttributionView.HorizontalAlignment.trailing**: Aligns horizontally with the trailing edge of the view.
